snippet.title: The Book of Good | Horror Game Awards February Showcase 2024
snippet.description:
Play as Yvonne in this first-person, short, single life horror adventure. There are no second chances. Complete the tasks her mother started and be careful--stay alive!

With only a flashlight and your wits, you must face unsettling encounters with the mysterious residents of the home. Find items and learn the secrets of the house and what lies below while searching for the Book of Good. Learn the history of the family who lived there. Who were Michelle, Tobias and Cassie? Why was the Book of Good so important to them?

You must find your brother who is lost in the mansion. Where is he, who took him? And make sure you stay away from what lives in the house--they are not friendly. They do not want you here.

Find the Book of Good and what it means. Get out of the house as soon as possible!

STEAM LINK: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2755200/The_Book_of_Good/#:~:text=The%20Book%20of%20Good%20on%20Steam&text=Play%20as%20Yvonne%20in%20this,be%20careful%2D%2Dstay%20alive!
---
The Horror Game Awards started towards the end of 2022 as a Horror Game of the Year Award set up by two die hard horror game fans. Fourteen content creators made up that year’s jury. It was such a success that in 2023 the jury doubled in size and the awards expanded their scope.

The aim of the awards is simple: to celebrate horror as one of the best genres in video games and to recognise the year’s greatest horror games alongside the developers who make them.

Website: https://thehorrorgameawards.com/
Merch: https://store.thehorrorgameawards.com/

Discord: https://discord.gg/j8wUUzJQ8D
Twitter: https://twitter.com/HorrorGameAward
Instagram: https://instagram.com/thehorrorgameawards
